issue.title: Stubtest: verify stub methods or properties are decorated with `@final` if they are decorated with `@final` at runtime
issue.body: This implements most of #14924. The only thing it _doesn't_ implement is verification for overloaded methods decorated with `@final` -- I tried working on that, but hit #14950.

issue.title: [stubtest] Support `@final` decorator on methods as well
issue.body:
After https://github.com/python/mypy/pull/14922 is merged, I think we can also add a check that this source code has correct stubs:

```python
class A:
    @final
    def method(self): ...
```

Right now stubs do not have to add `@final` decorator, `stubtest` will allow both versions.

issue.title: stdlib: more deprecations

repository.name: typeshed
repository.description: Collection of library stubs for Python, with static types

issue.body:
I went through the list in https://docs.python.org/3.12/whatsnew/3.12.html#deprecated and added `@deprecated` in all cases where it seemed practical. I hope this will give more useful input for #11002.

I'll comment below on the individual deprecations.

issue.title: stubtest: special case final and deprecated
issue.body:
We should probably lean into the type checker harder here

Fixes #14950
Fixes https://github.com/python/typeshed/pull/11009#issuecomment-1805013903
